sentence.text: In colorectal cancer, cellular response to DNA damage stimulus-mediated induction of unregulated cell growth involves posttranslational mechanisms that prevent proteasomal degradation of proto-oncogene b-catenin (negative regulation of cell proliferation) and its eventual translocation to the nucleus.

entity.text: cellular response to DNA damage stimulus

sentence.text: Here, we show in colorectal cancer that increased expression of negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, the gene coding for transcription factor negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, correlated with reduced patient survival.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Tissue arrays showed that negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II protein was overexpressed in the early stages of colorectal cancer.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
